mapper.select: select project_id, staff_id, is_signed, enter_date, quit_date, salary, status, remark, is_settled, quit_reason, staff_name from project_staff

select t1.staff_id,t1.id_number,t1.staff_name,t1.gender, t2.salary,date_format(t2.enter_date ,'%Y%m%d') enter_date, date_format(t2.quit_date ,'%Y%m%d') quit_date,is_valid, t2.remark,t2.is_signed,t2.status from staff_resource_pool t1,project_staff t2 where t1.staff_id = t2.staff_id and t2.project_id = #{projectId} and t1.company_id = #{companyId} order by enter_date desc
